ing: 1/2 honeydew melon - peeled, seeded, and cubed
des: "Fresh cantaloupe, honeydew, peaches, strawberries, apples, and whatever else you have on hand are pureed to make a quick, delicious, and healthy pick-me-up breakfast or picnic side dish. Drop a few blueberries or raspberries in it to kick it up a notch! It's also a great way to use up leftovers from party platters!"
ins:
Combine the peach, strawberries, apple, cantaloupe, and honeydew in a blender; blend until only slightly chunky, 20 to 30 seconds. Pour in the cream of coconut, nutmeg, honey, and lime juice; blend until smooth.
Divide the mixture evenly between 8 bowls. Top each bowl with a few blueberries and serve cold.
